content.headline: Simple, short-term installments
content.subHeadline: Interest-free payments every 2 weeks, starting today, with no impact to your credit score. Available on purchases from {minAmount}-{maxAmount}.

title: Check out with
PayPal
and choose
Pay Later
items: Pay in 4 is not available to residents of Wisconsin, North Dakota, Missouri, or any U.S. Territories.
Late fees may apply for missed payments depending on your state of residency
When applying, a soft credit check may be needed, but will not affect your credit score.
